__e: Half of us don't know who the hell our fathers are.
There's a lot of fathers who are around all the time... that don't pay any attention to their kids.
Fathes are never what they're cracked up to be.
It's just, we're not fans of the Elders now.
If you came here to get revenge for what happened to your daddies, consider it done. We're even now.
Aw. How do you mean? It's nice for baby to have two daddies who love each other.
We need to find the demon fathers.
Well, the Elders didn't really send me down here to work with the whole family.
Remember, you can't have two dads and make that mistake.
We are two... very lucky fathers.
There's places where a father would kill a man for doing what you're doing, you know that, don't you?
It's a true love, and it's bigger than you, and the Elders, and... all of this.
(Sobs) there's a club-- the dead dad's club-- and you can be in it until you're in it.
It's natural, but very soon you'll begin to feel that this is your home... and that we are like your parents and siblings.
Yes, I know you Elders were dead set against that.
Our fathers were friends, though mine never reached the eminence of yours.
Our fathers were evil men, all of us here.
